message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, let's be realistic!
I'll give you 55, but I need 45.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to protect my share!
You're being too cautious, I'm taking a risk!
I'll give you 35, but I need 65.
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you a bit more!
You're running out of time, I'm making my move!
I'll never give up, I'll do better than that!
This is my last stand, I won't give up!
You're almost out of time, take it or leave it!
I'll never accept such a bad deal, I'll try to squeeze more out of you!
I'll give you most of it, just please don't leave me with nothing!
